PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-06132018-05-29,  ,  ,  ESDC,  OAG, 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of Auditor and Joint Auditor of Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation for the year ** 2018 **
PrecisOrder Appointing (1) ERNST & YOUNG LLP of Ottawa, Ontario, as AUDITOR of Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation for the year 2018; and (2) the Auditor General of Canada as JOINT AUDITOR of Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation for the year 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
